title: How to make Hiren'sBoot n BartPE in 1 CD

forumNotes.author: sparkieau
forumNotes.content:
I am quite appreciate on the Hiren's Boot CD and BartPE CD.  
They both have their own features. Whether can let them together  
in 1 CD with Boot Menu to select on it.

forumNotes.author: Brito
forumNotes.content:
Your best help is google.  

Try learning how to use BCDW and this should be enough.  

[http://www.wolfgang-...ownloads_e.html](http://www.wolfgang-brinkmann.de/bcdw/downloads_e.html "External link")  
[http://bootcd.narod.ru/bcdw_e.htm](http://bootcd.narod.ru/bcdw_e.htm "External link")  

Use Version 2.x and read the instructions and examples that come on the 1.5x package.  

I'll be moving this thread to another location as it is not related to VistaPE.
